extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the tests that we need to carry out, including unit and integration tests.
    Author:
    Younes Boubekeur

    • Method Detail

      • testOdometer

        public static void testOdometer​()
        Test the Odometer class This test does not depend on Navigation. The robot is instructed to perform the equivalent of the following pseudocode: 
        

    Wait for button press
    for i in range (0,4):   
        Go forward for 2 tiles
        Turn right by 90o
    Go forward for 2 tiles
    Turn right by 153.435o
    Go forward for 2.236 tiles
    Turn left by 108.435o
    Go forward for 1.414 tiles
    Turn left by 45o
    Stop
        This is a picture of the robot's trajectory. The starting coordinate is (1,1).
